channel.title: What I was reading in Maximum PC
channel.description:
Well I just got done reading a maximum pc article that caught my eye when I was buying a book so I had to get it.
They made 3 pcs for every budget plan and I decided to share them with you just because I thought they were pretty good.
[table] [tr][td]Cpu[/td][td]AMD Phenom II X3 720[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Motherboard[/td][td]MSI DKA790GX[/td][/tr] [tr][td]RAM[/td][td]Kingston HyperX 4GB[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Videocard[/td][td]HIS Radeon 4870 512MB[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Harddrive[/td][td]Western Digital Caviar 500 Black[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Optical Drive[/td][td]Samsung SG-S223F[/td][/tr] [tr][td]PSU[/td][td]Rosewill RP550V2-S-SL[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Case[/td][td]Antec 900[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Total[/td][td][b]$692[/b][/td][/tr] [/table]
[table] [tr][td]Cpu[/td][td]Intel 2.66GHz Core i7-920[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Motherboard[/td][td]Gigabyte GA-EX58-UD3R[/td][/tr] [tr][td]RAM[/td][td]Patriot 6GB Viper DDR3/1600[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Videocard[/td][td]Diamond Radeon HD 4870 X2[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Harddrive[/td][td]Segate 1.5TB 7200.11 Barracuda[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Optical Drive[/td][td]Samsung SG-S223F[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Cooling[/td][td]Thermalright Ultra 120E-1366[/td][/tr] [tr][td]PSU[/td][td]Corsair 850TX[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Case[/td][td]Thermaltake Element S[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Total[/td][td][b]$1417[/b][/td][/tr] [/table]
[table] [tr][td]Cpu[/td][td]Intel Core i7-975 Extreme Edition[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Motherboard[/td][td]Asus P6T Deluxe 2.0[/td][/tr] [tr][td]RAM[/td][td]Corsair Dominator 1600 C8[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Videocard[/td][td]DUAL EVGA GeForce GTX 285[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Solid Slate Harddrive[/td][td]Corsair P256[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Harddrive[/td][td]Segate 1.5TB 7200.11 Baracuda[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Optical Drive[/td][td]LG GGC-H20L[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Cooling[/td][td]Thermalright Ultra 120E-1366[/td][/tr] [tr][td]PSU[/td][td]PC Power & Cooling Silencer 910[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Case[/td][td]Cooler Master ATCS 840[/td][/tr] [tr][td]Total[/td][td][b]$3525[/b][/td][/tr] [/table]

item.title: What I was reading in Maximum PC
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Well I just got done reading a maximum pc article that caught my eye when I was buying a book so I had to get it.

They made 3 pcs for every budget plan and I decided to share them with you just because I thought they were pretty good.

[table]
[tr][td]Cpu[/td][td]AMD Phenom II X3 720[/td][/tr]
[tr][td]Motherboard[/td][td]MSI DKA790GX[/td][/tr]
